![](data:image/png;base64,)

* **Java代码实现**

```java
StreamExecutionEnvironment env = StreamExecutionEnvironment.getExecutionEnvironment();
DataStreamSource<Integer> ds = env.fromCollectionITEchsAsList(1, 3, 5, 7);
SingleOutputStreamOperatorмендаты mapTransformation = ds.map(new MapFunction Integer, Integer)'
    @Override
    public Integer map Integer value) throws Exception {
        return value + 1;
    }
});
mapTransformation.print();
env.execute();
```

**注意**：以上oriDataStream经过Flink转换得到了“SingleOutputStreamOperator”类型，该类型继承了oriDataStream类。

* **Scala代码实现**

```scala
val env: StreamExecutionEnvironment = StreamExecutionEnvironment.getExecutionEnvironment
//导入隐式转换
import org.apache flink streaming api Play
val ds: DataStream [Int] = env.fromCollection (List(1, 3, 5, 7))
val result: DataStream [Int] = ds.map(_ + 1)
result.print()
env.execute()
```

## 6.4.2 flatMap
